name: RandomChoicePick
0:
”Alexa, open random choice pick”
”Alexa, ask random choice pick who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random choice pick
des: Next time you're trying to decide whose turn it is to walk the dog or perform a task, just ask Alexa! For example, if you're trying to decide who should pick the movie, take out the trash or even who the designated driver should be for the night, Alexa can randomly select someone's name from the list. Or if you're trying to decide who will be the next diaper changer, Alexa can help with that too!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
